participant_decisions.sent: The target group are: 15 -35 yrs old, decision makers, Alternatively make a contract with the manufacturer of the TV's to supply remote with the TV.
Functions are Power, Channel, Volume, Power control, Enter, The user interface should have big, user friendly buttons and be easy to use.
Rechargeable, with docking would be a good selling point.
Speech recognition would be too expensive to pursue very actively on the budget we have.
